original_text: So, Job, you do not understand what you are saying. You speak a lot of words but they do not mean anything.’ So, Job, you do not understand what you are saying. You speak a lot of words but they do not mean anything.’ So, Job, you do not understand what you are saying. You speak a lot of words but they do not mean anything.’ So, Job, you do not understand what you are saying.
korean_text: 욥이 헛되이 입을 열어 지식 없는 말을 많이 하는구나

sentences.original_text: So, Job, you do not understand what you are saying.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 욥이여, 당신은 자신이 무슨 말을 하는지 이해하지 못합니다.

sentences.original_text: You speak a lot of words
but they do not mean anything.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 말들은 아무 의미가 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: So, Job, you do not understand what you are saying.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 욥이여, 당신은 자신이 무슨 말을 하는지 이해하지 못합니다.

sentences.original_text: You speak a lot of words
but they do not mean anything.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 말들은 아무 의미가 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: So, Job, you do not understand what you are saying.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 욥이여, 당신은 자신이 무슨 말을 하는지 이해하지 못합니다.

sentences.original_text: You speak a lot of words
but they do not mean anything.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 말들은 아무 의미가 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: So, Job, you do not understand what you are saying.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 욥이여, 당신은 자신이 무슨 말을 하는지 이해하지 못합니다.
